summary: In colonial America, wanderer Deerslayer gets involved with Tom Hutter, a bigoted trapper, and his two contrasting daughters.
cast: Lex Barker|Rita Moreno|Forrest Tucker|Cathy O'Donnell|Jay C. Flippen|Carlos Rivas|Joseph Vitale|John Halloran|Addison Richards|Carol Henry|Phil Schumacher
title: The Deerslayer
